entry.title: [SYD/SGP][Delivery] - APAC
entry.content:
Jun 28, 13:23 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 28, 08:04 UTC
Update - Start time : 27/06/2023 07:08 UTC
End time : 28/06/2023 07:53 UTC
Service status : The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause: It was due to a malfunction on a robot migration

Jun 28, 07:42 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 28, 07:41 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 27/06/2023 07:08 UTC
Service impact : Lifecycle of APAC servers are unreachable (delivery/suspension/deletion)
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [CA/APAC][DedicatedServer] - Server certificate at delivery
entry.content:
Jun 28, 13:41 UTC
Update - Further investigation reported the same situation on CA and APAC zones.
We continue to work on the issue.

Jun 28, 12:56 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 20/06/2023 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Server certificate is not generated for servers in MUM when delivering a server
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [BHS4][DedicatedServers] - Rack T04D26
entry.content:
Jun 27, 19:28 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 27/06/2023 13:29 UTC
End Time : 27/06/2023 19:27 UTC
Root cause : Cooling malfunction
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 27, 19:10 UTC
Identified - Most of the impacted servers are up anew.
Our technical teams are working on the few remaining ones.

Jun 27, 13:52 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 27/06/2023 13:29 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in the rack T04D26 are down.
Root cause : Cooling malfunction
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.content:
Jun 27, 16:39 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 27/06/2023 15:00 UTC
End Time : 27/06/2023 15:50 UTC
Root cause : Public switch malfunction.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 27, 15:52 UTC
Update - Most of impacted servers are up anew.
Out technical teams are working on resolving the issue for the few remaining ones.

Jun 27, 14:21 UTC
Identified - Start time : 27/06/2023 14:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the rack BHS0811B02A are no longer responding.
Root cause : Public switch malfunction.
Ongoing actions : Our teams identified the incident and solved it.

entry.title: [Global][DedicatedServers] - CentOS 7 CPanel EoL
entry.content:
Jun 27, 15:38 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 27, 15:34 UTC
Scheduled - End time : 31/07/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : centos7-cpanel won't be available for installation any more
Related Documentation : cPanel Deprecation Plan

Starting with version 112, cPanel & WHM no longer support CentOS 7. We will no longer offer centos7-cpanel-latest for installation after 2023-07-31.
Customers are advised to install alma8-cpanel-latest instead.

entry.title: [GRA1][DedicatedServers] - Racks G122A08 G122A09
entry.content:
Jun 27, 14:29 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 26/06/2023 11:58 UTC
End Time : 26/06/2023 23:00 UTC
Root cause : Cooling system malfunction.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 27, 03:54 UTC
Update - Servers in rack G122A09 are reachable.
Our teams are currently working on servers in rack G122A08.

Jun 26, 18:56 UTC
Update - Our teams always work to provide service as quickly as possible.

Jun 26, 16:48 UTC
Update - Update : Network equipement have been replace in rack G122A09.
Our teams are currently focusing on the servers that are still unavailable, on a case-by-case basis, in order to restore service as quickly as possible.

Jun 26, 15:17 UTC
Identified - Update : Our teams need to replace network equipment.

Jun 26, 12:02 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 26/06/2023 11:58 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the racks G122A08 and G122A09 are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
